entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
